solution_line_template: Benny spent a total of ${total_spent} - ${cost_soft_drinks} on soft drinks = $<<{total_spent}-{cost_soft_drinks}={cost_candy_bars}>>{cost_candy_bars} on candy bars.
Benny spent ${cost_candy_bars} / {num_candy_bars} candy bars = $<<{cost_candy_bars}/{num_candy_bars}={cost_per_candy_bar}>>{cost_per_candy_bar} for each candy bar.
